description:
In this course titled ' Take 6 Simple Steps That Virtually Guarantee Achieving Goals.' By Pradeep Aggarwal you will learn-

  • About goals – why many people fail to achieve their goals
  • Find out how self hypnosis can help you achieve your goals
  • Learn how to correctly program your mind using self hypnosis so that you achieve your goals successfully
  • 6 steps to successfully achieve your goals and vision in life.

You will be able to master self hypnosis techniques to achieve your goals and get a good idea about your conscious and sub conscious mind and how they differ from each other .

You will be able to relax your mind easily using self hypnosis techniques and exercises .

This course is ideal for everyone especially students as it provides simple steps to achieve your goals in your daily and professional life.

All 6 steps have a certain aim and technique that help you come closer to your goal and vision in life.

This course is in English and contains more than 35 minutes of live recorded video content designed in over 13 lectures .

This course contains -

Lecture1:Introduction

­­Lecture2:About The 6 Step Process

Lecture3:Remove Myths About Self Hypnosis

Lecture4:Conscious Mind Vs Subconscious Mind

Lecture5:How To Enter Into The State Of Self Hypnosis

Lecture6:How To Master Self Hypnosis To Reprogram Your Subconscious Mind

Lecture7:Find Out What Is The First Step To Achieve Your Goal

Lecture8:Find Out What Is The Second Step To Achieve Your Goal

Lecture9:Third Step Towards Your Goal : How To Get Into Action?

Lecture10:The Fourth Step: Why Reinforce Your Goal?

Lecture11:The Fifth Step: Moving Towards Your Goals

Lecture12:The Sixth And Last Step:Practice Affirmations To Expect The Result

Lecture13:Affirmations E-book

Lecture 14: Summary
title: Take 6 Simple Steps That Virtually Guarantee Achieving Goals
